Name: fdwhandler
column6: references a handler function that is responsible for supplying execution routines for the foreign-data wrapper. zero if no handler is provided

Name: fdwvalidator
column6: references a validator function that is responsible for checking the validity of the options given to the foreign-data wrapper, as well as options for foreign servers and user mappings using the foreign-data wrapper. zero if no validator is provided

Name: fdwacl
column6: access privileges; see grant and revoke for details

Name: fdwoptions
column6: foreign-data wrapper specific options, as "keyword=value" strings
